title: Self-Directed Foreign Language Leadership Course Utilizing AI-Enhanced Virtual Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Foreign Language Communication Skills and Digital Device Usage Experience
context.additional_context: Mobile-optimized LMS for smartphone-centric learning environments, integrating real-time collaboration tools and AI tutor systems

learning_goals: Learners can write work-related foreign language presentation scripts with 80% or higher accuracy using an AI-based feedback system.
Learner teams complete cross-cultural communication simulation projects in virtual collaborative environments with a 90% completion rate.
Learners establish personalized learning plans through an adaptive assessment system within the LMS and complete over 85% of the 4-week course.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
